name: Summer Piano Lesson
description:
Alen Roussel is a pianist who decided to take a long  break in his career after  being in a painful situation.

He wanted to live quietly and get away from the piano for a while. Until one summer, he had to become a piano teacher for a young boy named Emile.

Will Emile change Alen's confusing life with the piano? 

Made in two weeks for NaNoRenO2022

Also, SORRY for my wobbly and incorrect english ! 

Characters 

~ Alen Roussel (MC) : The piano teacher who  is always unsure with his own feelings.

~Emile Jacob:  The energetic and joyful student who always admired and respected Alen.

~Takagiri:   Alen's ex-manager who always comes to see him (not suspicious). 

Features 
  • 8,900~ words
  • 4 CGs
  • 4 endings 
  • Just a sweet friendship between characters (with a slight  romance). 

This is my first Visual Novel I ever made and also written so maybe it can be odd...
